lead_paragraph: Vicky Galindo hit a three-run home run and Jessica Mendoza drove in three runs to power the United States to a 9-0 victory against the Dominican Republic yesterday at the World Cup of Softball in Oklahoma City.The Americans (3-0) have outscored opponents by 26-1 at the World Cup and by 122-3 in 13 games this year.The United States was to face Japan last night in a rematch of the past two World Cup finals.
